channel.title: Developer Guide on Apache Flink CDC
channel.description: Recent content in Developer Guide on Apache Flink CDC

item.title: Understand Flink CDC API
item.description: Understand Flink CDC API # If you are planning to build your own Flink CDC connectors, or considering contributing to Flink CDC, you might want to hava a deeper look at the APIs of Flink CDC. This document will go through some important concepts and interfaces in order to help you with your development. Event # An event under the context of Flink CDC is a special kind of record in Flink’s data stream.

item.title: Contribute to Flink CDC
item.description: Contributing # Flink CDC is developed by an open and friendly community and welcomes anyone who wants to help out in any way. There are several ways to interact with the community and contribute to Flink CDC including asking questions, filing bug reports, proposing new features, joining discussions on the mailing lists, contributing code or documentation, improving website, testing release candidates and writing corresponding blog etc. What do you want to do # Contributing to Flink CDC goes beyond writing code for the project.

item.title: Licenses
item.description: Licenses # Flink CDC is licensed under Apache License 2.0. If you have any question regarding licenses, just contact us. Apache Software Foundation # You could know more about ASF as follows. Apache Software Foundation License Events Security SponSprShip Thanks Privacy
